attributes.action: moon based polluting energy sources transmitted back to Earth.
attributes.additional_details: using nicolai tessla tech and all its modern day offshoots in wireless energy transmisions it IS posible theoretically to have the worlds energy needs in the form of nuclear thorium(when developed) plants and all other forms of polluting energy sources to have all of them based on the moon where we simply transmit the energy back to earth .. therefore no need for risking one life for the sake of societys polluted model as it stands
